title: My Schedule
subtitle: Manage your upcoming sessions and meetings
empty: No sessions in this date range yet. Once you book a session, it will appear here on the calendar.
availability_subtitle: Set the times when you're available
instructions_drag: Click and drag on the calendar to add availability
instructions_click: Click on an existing green slot to delete it
instructions_green: Green slots indicate times you're available
confirm_clear_day: Clear all availability for this day?
confirm_clear_all: Are you sure you want to clear ALL your availability?
